hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -euo pipefail
# ====== CONFIGURATION ====== DATE=$(date +%F-%H-%M) REPO_DIR="$WORKSPACE/git-backup" # Dedicated Git repo folder BACKUP_DIR="$REPO_DIR/jenkins-backup-$DATE" JENKINS_HOME="/var/lib/jenkins" BRANCH="main" GIT_USER_NAME="Jenkins Backup Bot" GIT_USER_EMAIL="jenkins@example.com" GIT_REPO="git@github.com:shanthish16/Jenkins-backup.git" # ============================
echo "=== Creating backup directory at: $BACKUP_DIR ===" mkdir -p "$BACKUP_DIR"
echo "=== Copying Jenkins data ===" cp -r "$JENKINS_HOME/jobs" "$BACKUP_DIR/" 2>/dev/null || echo "⚠ jobs directory missing" cp -r "$JENKINS_HOME/plugins" "$BACKUP_DIR/" 2>/dev/null || echo "⚠ plugins directory missing" cp -r "$JENKINS_HOME/users" "$BACKUP_DIR/" 2>/dev/null || echo "⚠ users directory missing" cp "$JENKINS_HOME/config.xml" "$BACKUP_DIR/" 2>/dev/null || echo "⚠ config.xml missing" cp "$JENKINS_HOME/credentials.xml" "$BACKUP_DIR/" 2>/dev/null || echo "⚠ credentials.xml missing"
echo "=== Initializing Git repo ===" mkdir -p "$REPO_DIR" cd "$REPO_DIR"
if [ ! -d ".git" ]; then git init git remote add origin "$GIT_REPO" git checkout -b "$BRANCH" else git fetch origin "$BRANCH" || echo "⚠ Failed to fetch branch, continuing..." git checkout "$BRANCH" || git checkout -b "$BRANCH" git pull --rebase origin "$BRANCH" || echo "⚠ Nothing to rebase" fi
git config user.name "$GIT_USER_NAME" git config user.email "$GIT_USER_EMAIL"
echo "=== Copying backup into repo ===" # Clear old backup folder if exists rm -rf "$REPO_DIR/jenkins-backup-*" cp -r "$BACKUP_DIR"/* "$REPO_DIR/"
echo "=== Adding and committing backup ===" git add . git commit -m "Jenkins Backup on $DATE" || echo "⚠ Nothing to commit"
echo "=== Pushing to GitHub ===" # Force push if necessary git push origin "$BRANCH" || git push --force origin "$BRANCH"
echo "✅ Backup completed and pushed to GitHub."
